message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the development of an efficient and scalable technique for Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS), which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed model uses mobile agents, which are a type of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), to update the signature databases at regular intervals. The system also deals with network traffic, which is a key aspect of network infrastructure (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the creation and use of multiple databases, which involves database management (cs.DB) and distributed computing (cs.DC). Finally, the paper proposes a new model for IDS, which involves software engineering (cs.SE).
